hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition via Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a NEUTRAL regime with 20-day realized volatility below 40% and 14-day ATR compression to <2.5% of price, a daily close below the 20-day Bollinger Lower Band (2 std) while VIX > 18 signals high-probability transition to BEAR regime within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with compressed volatility often precede directional breaks. Low volatility + VIX elevation suggests equity market stress spilling into crypto. ETH/BTC weakness confirms broad risk-off. Bollinger break provides clear technical trigger.
entry_conditions: Daily close below 20-day Bollinger Lower Band (2 std)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC price drops 8% from entry OR regime shifts to BEAR (confidence > 70%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC reclaims 20-day SMA with volume > 20-day average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of such signals fail to produce BEAR regime within 5 days OR average drawdown > 3% on stop-loss triggers.
